casebody.data:
Amanda LANGFORD,1 Petitioner Below, Appellant,
v.
Bruce LANGFORD, Respondent, Appellee. No. 321, 2018
File No. CK15-02506 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: December 14, 2018
Decided: February 19, 2019

By Order dated June 22, 2018, the Court sua sponte assigned pseudonyms to the parties. Del. Sup. Ct. R. 7(d).

--------

AFFIRMED.
